summary: The diff introduces multiple functional/frontend changes and a deployment checklist document, but it does not provide evidence of an actual deployment/build being produced or accessible via a preview/live URL. AMC tab wiring and authentication gating appear present, while ₹ currency consistency is only partially evidenced (utility added, but no proof of adoption across all UI).

missing_requirements.requirement: Deploy a new build of the current application state so the latest changes are live/previewable (new build produced and accessible via the platform preview/live URL).
missing_requirements.reason: The diff only adds a checklist document and code changes; it does not include any deployment configuration, pipeline change, version bump, or other evidence that a new build was produced and made accessible at a standard preview/live URL.

missing_requirements.requirement: UI-rendered money amounts use ₹ formatting consistently across the UI (including dashboards and analytics views).
missing_requirements.reason: A new formatCurrency() helper using INR/₹ is added, but the diff summary does not show updates to the actual UI components (Dashboard overview cards, Revenue analytics, AMC views, dialogs) to ensure they all use it. Therefore, consistent ₹ usage across the UI is not verifiable from the provided changes.

hallucinated_features.description: Added 'Deployment Checklist' documentation with verification steps and a 'Build Process' section.
hallucinated_features.reason: The request was to deploy a new build with no functional changes; adding new documentation/checklists was not requested as a deliverable feature.

hallucinated_features.description: New data persistence validation toast and loading/validation UI messaging in the main app.
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-1/REQ-2 ask for deployment and verification of AMC tab visibility and ₹ formatting; adding new toast notifications and loading-state messaging changes UI behavior beyond deployment verification.

hallucinated_features.description: DashboardOverview behavior change: 'Due for Service' now shows only customers with service dates in the current month and changes the description text to 'Due this month'.
hallucinated_features.reason: This is a functional/UI behavior change unrelated to deployment verification, which is explicitly a non-goal.

hallucinated_features.description: Customer import phone normalization and other CustomersTab/AddCustomerDialog behavior changes.
hallucinated_features.reason: These are new/changed application behaviors not requested (non-goal: no feature/UI behavior changes unrelated to deployment verification).

hallucinated_features.description: Added/changed hooks: new useAddAMC and useGetUpcomingServices, plus expanded query invalidation behavior.
hallucinated_features.reason: New hooks and backend-operation wiring are functional additions not requested by the deployment-only build request.

hallucinated_features.description: Profile setup modal behavior for first-time user profile creation (name/email) referenced as part of frontend changes.
hallucinated_features.reason: User profile setup is not part of REQ-1/REQ-2 and constitutes additional functionality.
